actions.recommendation: ENT: Swollen nasal turbinates, enlarged tonsils but not erythematous or pustular. Flixonase nasules suggested
Very important to start changing your lifestyle and making the dietary and exercise changes. You are more than capable of achieving a weight reduction by adjusting your lifestyle.

Your BMI falls in the obesity category and your waist to height ratio is more than 50%. Weight loss is essential in decreasing your cardiovascular risk and optimising your health. Aim for BMI <25 and ratio of <50%
